triton.compiler.errors.CompilationError: at 54:15:
    vals = tl.where(mask_vals, x_vals, 0.0)

    # perform an inclusive scan within the tile in registers
    vals = tl.cumsum(vals, axis=0)

    # store back per-element cumsums
    tl.store(y_row_ptr + offs * stride_n, vals, mask=in_bounds)

    # tile sum is the last element of the in-register cumsum
    # (for a partial tile, trailing out-of-bounds columns were zeros,
    #  so the last position still holds the correct tile sum)
    tile_sum = vals[BLOCK_SIZE - 1]
